data:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #vacancy #remote #react #nextjs #gamedev

–ù–∞–∑–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏–∏: Top Remote Talent 
https://topremotetalent.com/
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: remote
–ì–æ—Ä–æ–¥ –∏ –∞–¥—Ä–µ—Å –æ—Ñ–∏—Å–∞: Tallinn, Estonia
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: full-time
–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –≤–∏–ª–∫–∞: starting at $5000
–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã: @ibfranky

A deep learning start-up providing solution for a game dev industry whose customers include Tencent, Huawei, HTC, Vodafone, and Wargaming, among many others, is looking for an experienced full-stack web developer to join their team.
You'll be responsible for building and maintaining mostly front-end experiences of the company's main product avatar platform.
You will build high-quality web front-end components for the platform that are fast, reliable, well-tested, easy to use, and visually pleasing. You take responsibility for creating frontends that work well on desktop and mobile platforms providing a great user experience.

Desired skills & experience:
‚Ä¢ 3-5+ years of experience working with React or a similar framework.
‚Ä¢ Skilled with common technologies such as JS, TypeScript and their modern features.
‚Ä¢ Experienced in building reusable UI components or libraries.
‚Ä¢ Experienced in building performant frontends using the latest tools and frameworks.
‚Ä¢ You are front-end focused, excited about creating delightful user experiences.
‚Ä¢ Product-minded and good design understanding with a keen eye for UI/UX.
‚Ä¢ Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Previous working experience mostly in product companies, not outsourcing.
‚Ä¢ Entrepreneurial, excited to work independently, ambitious, high-energy, pro-active, analytical.
‚Ä¢ English C1
‚Ä¢ You like to play games.

Nice-to-have
‚Ä¢ Experience with NextJS React Framework.
‚Ä¢ Experience with 3D rendering ‚Äì ThreeJS or other web-based 3D engines.
‚Ä¢ Experience building high-scale consumer-facing web applications.
‚Ä¢ Working with cross-platform native and web app toolkits such as Ionic, Electron, React Native.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in a startup


Working Conditions:
‚Ä¢ Competitive cash salary and equity.
‚Ä¢ Unlimited days off and sick days.
‚Ä¢ Work in a remote-first team anywhere in the world.
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours.
‚Ä¢ Company retreats (when no corona).
label: Fullstack-—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫

Middle backend Python developer in team developing healthcare mobile application

current stack
Backend:
‚Ä¢ Python, Flask

‚Ä¢ GraphQL, REST

Your profile
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of experience in Python 3

‚Ä¢ Experience with Flask & SqlAlchemy
‚Ä¢ You are able to read technical documentation in English
‚Ä¢ You can work in development team independently without micromanagement needs
‚Ä¢ You are open minded to learn new technologies, especially from our stack
‚Ä¢ You are familiar with CI/CD tools

‚Ä¢ Bonus: experience with Scrum and Agile practices, using JIRA/Confluence

What we offer
‚Ä¢ To join a result-oriented excellent team with clear vision of 5 years roadmap
‚Ä¢ Meaningful ‚Äúvalue-for-people‚Äù healthcare product
‚Ä¢ Paying or Reimbursing Employees for Work-Related Education and European IT-conferences attendance
‚Ä¢ Paid relocation to Budva, Montenegro after the trial period & visa sponsorship
‚Ä¢ Paid medical insurance, corporate yoga
‚Ä¢ Open company culture, leadership based on competence
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours

Position:¬†Data Engineer
Company:¬†Peakdata (http://peakdata.ch/)
Location:¬†remote.
Salary range in USD: 2,500 - 3,200 USD/month (gross)
Salary range in RUB: 180 000 ‚Äì 230 000 Rub/month (na ruki)
Contact:¬†mfeldman@peakdata.ch

We are young and ambitious startup in the field of AI and Data Science looking for a  join our team. We are active in the area of web mining and Language Processing. Are you up for the challenge?¬†

Responsibilities:¬†
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to process and integrate disparate data from different data sources
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to think with creativity, propose and lead development of data crunching software modules (mostly text analysis. NLP big plus)
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to work with version control system (Git)
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to understand software architecture and the existing workflow
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to clearly communicate in English
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to work independently in the remote work setting
¬†‚Ä¢ Be able to overlap with our business hours for a great collaboration.¬†

Requirements:
¬†‚Ä¢ At least 1 year of professional experience in data engineering/machine learning
¬†‚Ä¢ Experienced in the relevant Python and its libraries; Especially appreciated is the knowledge of the following libraries: pandas, request, beatifulsoup, lxml, scrappy, selenium, joblib
¬†‚Ä¢ Experience with backend development in Python - BIG PLUS
¬†‚Ä¢ Bachelor degree in computer science ‚ÄìPLUS
¬†‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of Docker - PLUS
¬†‚Ä¢ Good documentation skills
¬†‚Ä¢ Good written and spoken English
¬†‚Ä¢ Strong sense of ownership and responsibility for code quality that follows best practices
¬†‚Ä¢ Strong coding, problem-solving, and debugging skills
¬†‚Ä¢ Awesome communication, collaboration, and self-management skills.¬†

What we offer:
¬†‚Ä¢ Very interesting and innovative data product which includes real-world web data at scale (Tera to Petabytes)
¬†‚Ä¢ Competitive salary
¬†‚Ä¢ Highly professional and innovative team (most of our team members have either Masters or PhD)
¬†‚Ä¢ Flexible work environment with opportunity to work remotely at¬†¬†pajamas from your kitchen and still be part of interesting and innovative project üôÇ¬†If you feel like you might be a good fit please drop us a message at¬†mfeldman@peakdata.ch

–õ–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è: –£–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ø–æ—á—Ç–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –∫–∞–Ω–¥–∏–¥–∞—Ç—ã –∏–∑ –ú–æ—Å–∫–≤—ã/–°–ü–ë

–ó–ü: 4000-5000 USD, –¥–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –ò–ü
–ö–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç: –û–¥–∏–Ω –∏–∑ –∫—Ä—É–ø–Ω–µ–π—à–∏—Ö –±–∞–Ω–∫–æ–≤ –°–®–ê
Role/Position Overview:
As the senior software engineer, you will manage your project goals, contribute to product strategy and work closely with the principal engineer and lead architect on a number of challenging initiatives. We expect you to be passionate about architecture, CI/CD, agile delivery, devops and site reliability. 
Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Develop high quality, robust code  
‚Ä¢ Eliminate waste in the SDLC process.
‚Ä¢ Ensure your platform is fully compliant to Citi‚Äôs compliance, security and audit policies
‚Ä¢ Ensure system stability through enhancement/maintenance periods
Skillset
All good candidates with excellent software engineering skillsets will be considered. We do not expect candidates to have all these skills, but the successful candidate will demonstrate expertise in one or more of the following areas. 
‚Ä¢ Experience building streaming data architectures
‚Ä¢ Experience of Golang (Erlang equally beneficial) though we will consider candidates without direct experience who can show aptitude and understanding in:
ÔÇß Expert level of Java, Scala, Clojure, Python, Node.js, C#,  
ÔÇß Any functional language 
‚Ä¢ Experience building Java based applications 
‚Ä¢ Strong experience with Kubernetes, of special interest is building Kubernetes operators 
‚Ä¢ Good working knowledge of Data Meshes, Data Lakes and warehousing solutions  
‚Ä¢ Experience with designing and deploying container based services. 
‚Ä¢ Experience with Function as a Service platforms.
‚Ä¢ Proven experience working through the full product cycle from initial design to the final product 
‚Ä¢ Practical experience with CICD pipelines and Devops engineering 
‚Ä¢ Candidates would need to be in Moscow/St.Pete or being able to move there within 12  months .

GET Information Technology is an international software development and business consulting company headquartered in Germany. We develop Project & Process Management software solutions designed to support product development, engineering, and business processes. Today, organizations worldwide such as Siemens, SAP, Volkswagen, Mercedes or Knauf rely on our solutions to manage their projects, resources, and portfolios.

About the Role
Participate in the full project management lifecycle and ensure project deliverables are met, including budget and schedule planning, risk management activities, project execution and controlling, risk management activities and closing processes. Bring in your business change, technology and transformation expertise along with broader consulting skills to:
üéØAnalyze business requirements
üéØDefine project scope
üéØConduct project cost estimation
üéØResponsible for project planning and scheduling
üéØEnsure adherence to established project governance framework, successfully combining Agile and Waterfall approaches
üéØWork in a distributed team
üéØDirectly communicate with customers

üë®üèª‚Äçüíªüë©üèº‚ÄçüíªAbout You
Overall your experience should be around +2 years contributing within large scale projects, ideally applying balanced mix of traditional and agile methodologies with a ‚Äúdigital product and technology enabled‚Äù focus.
 ‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in a relevant area, preferably in economics, (business) informatics, (business) engineering
 ‚Ä¢ At least 2 years of successful industry experience, ideally from a consulting firm and/or within an industry player
 ‚Ä¢ Knowledge of software development lifecycle
 ‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience and expertise in project management methodologies
 ‚Ä¢ Attention to detail and ability to see ‚Äúthe big picture‚Äù
 ‚Ä¢ Keeping balance between customer orientation as a key priority and product development needs
 ‚Ä¢ Flexibility and adaptability count among your strengths
 ‚Ä¢ Empathic communication
 ‚Ä¢ Strong analytical and presentation skills
 ‚Ä¢ Ability and willingness to take responsibility
 ‚Ä¢ Collaborative team player mindset
 ‚Ä¢ Excellent communication (written and verbal) and interpersonal skills

About Us
üç™Excellent opportunities for professional growth, flat organizational structure, international management
üç™Official employment according to the Labor Code of the Russian Federation
üç™Competitive salary quoted in EUR and paid twice a month
üç™Flexible start of the working day
üç™Paid medical insurance 100%
üç™Lunch support & company discounts
üç™Free coffee & tea, refreshments, fresh fruit and snacks
üç™Dedicated workshop room with tools to inspire creativity and support design thinking
üç™Lounge zone and kicker

data:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–∫–∞ #frontend #react #remote #senior

Senior Frontend Developer (React)

–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Manigo (www.manigo.com)
–§–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—ã: —É–¥–∞–ª—ë–Ω–Ω–æ
–û—Ñ–∏—Å: London, UK
–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: –ø–æ–ª–Ω–∞—è
–ó–∞—Ä–ø–ª–∞—Ç–Ω–∞—è –≤–∏–ª–∫–∞: 2500 - 4000 USD

–ò—â–µ–º Senior Frontend —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫–∞ –≤ –õ–æ–Ω–¥–æ–Ω—Å–∫—É—é —Ñ–∏–Ω-—Ç–µ—Ö –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—é (Bank as a Service).

About us:
Based in London, Manigo is a Banking as a Service provider (Digital Banking, Payments and Cards). We offer modular banking capabilities and white label turnkey solutions, enabling businesses to easily add financial services to their range of products. 
We are the only digital banking enabler in the region that covers the whole value chain, from backend card and payment processing, to middleware and integrations, to frontend applications. 
Backed by partners including Mastercard, Microsoft and NatWest, Manigo is on an exciting scaleup growth trajectory. 

You will: 
 ‚Ä¢ Use ReactJS to turn designs into performant and maintainable user interfaces 
 ‚Ä¢ Develop testable and accessible web applications 
 ‚Ä¢ Work with designers to identify and solve potential implementation issues
 ‚Ä¢ Help translate user stories into technical solutions 
 ‚Ä¢ Mentor other engineers, support the technical culture, and help grow the team 
 ‚Ä¢ Generate ideas for new initiatives and technologies 
 ‚Ä¢ Communicate with project leads, product managers and other software developers 

You have: 
 ‚Ä¢ 4+ years related experience or demonstrated equivalent 
 ‚Ä¢ Experience with ReactJS and other modern JavaScript libraries and tooling 
 ‚Ä¢ Strong knowledge of semantic HTML, CSS and JavaScript 
 ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with responsive design/development and mobile-web best practices. 
 ‚Ä¢ Willingness to roll up your sleeves, collaborate with others and get stuff done 
 ‚Ä¢ Strong sense of responsibility; driving a project from inception to completion 
 ‚Ä¢ Affinity for solving problems and shipping impactful features, not polishing perfect code or 
architecture 
 ‚Ä¢ Experience working in a collaborative coding environment (and git specifically), refining designs 
together, working through code reviews and managing pull requests

You may also have: 
 ‚Ä¢ Understanding of A/B testing, tag management, analytics tools (such as Google Analytics) and pixel tracking 
 ‚Ä¢ Good understanding of relational databases 
 ‚Ä¢ Some experience and understanding of how monoliths get architected into service oriented 
systems

Our technology stack:
 ‚Ä¢ We use React for frontend applications
 ‚Ä¢ We use Node.js + Express.js for providing end API for integrators
 ‚Ä¢ We use Java for handling money transactions
 ‚Ä¢ We use MySQL and PostgreSQL for data storage
 ‚Ä¢ Redis for caching and async task brokering
 ‚Ä¢ Azure for infrastructure and other services supporting the platform

What we offer: 
 ‚Ä¢ Young, agile team and an opportunity to collaborate on challenging enterprise systems and products
 ‚Ä¢ Participating in cloud-based projects (Azure, AWS), working with the latest technologies
 ‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and equity 
 ‚Ä¢ Remote work 
 ‚Ä¢ 33 days holiday per year incl. public/Bank holidays

–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã:
@ilin_roman
ilin.roman.serg@gmail.com

Communication is an extremely important factor. We need someone who will take the initiative, own a project, communicate as much as necessary to clarify REQs/affected areas, create test cases, review with the team, execute scenarios, and then take it a step further and automate.Person Specification 
 
UI Automation framework tools to Webdriver.io and TestProject.io. On the API side, we are writing the API tests in Node JS, using the Jest test framework.

‚Ä¢  Candidate must have at least 4 years UI Automation experience 
‚Ä¢  Candidate must have 2-3 years‚Äô experience working with JS language

 Would be great if candidates would also have API level testing experience.

data:
Senior Python Developer Job Description
      
We are looking for a Senior Python developer for remote work in our worldwide team. We need a manager who wants to take part in something big and assumes responsibility for the success of a new and innovative e-commerce project.
The right candidate will be someone with an open mind who loves to solve problems and who strives to take their projects to the next level.
      
Job Type: Remote, full-time
       
- Main soft skills requirements for candidates:


1. Strong background with python 4+ years.
2. Experience with Python 3 version.
3. Experience creating API with Flask and Flask Restplus.
4. Experience with the following frameworks: SQLAlchemy, Celery, Marshmallow.
5. Strong background working with MySQL and MongoDB Databases.
6. Experience with Kubernetes and Docker.
 
- Main soft skills requirements for candidates:
       
1. Strong desire and a proactive attitude to work.
2. English - at least Intermediate level.
3. Strong problem-solving abilities.
4. Flexibility and team player.
5. Ability to work in a timezone close to the US.

Apply at yotam@autods.com
label: Python-—Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—á–∏–∫

#developer #reverse #engineer #vacancy #relocation #germany 

Vacancy: C++ developer 
There is a Reverse Engineer position also - contact to know more. 
Location: #Berlin , Germany :de: 
Format: office full-time 
Salary: 75-120k euro. After 1 year - 120k guaranteed. 

We're looking for smart, creative C++ developers and Reverse Engineers with a solid theoretical background for a company "think-cell". They will work largely independently and will be responsible for the whole range of activities when implementing a new feature. The developers should be able to look at a problem from the user's perspective and discuss abstract concepts with fellow developers. 

Team size: 20 developers reporting directly to CTO 
Language: fluent English is mandatory, German is a plus 
Working experience: any 
Education: EU citizens/residence holders ‚Äì any; others have to have a University degree (starting from Bachelor) so we can sponsor the work permit 
We accept different profiles for C++ developer position, disregarding the former specialization and years of experience. For think-cell, it is more important to evaluate the programming abilities rather than a nice resume and past projects.

Contacts: 
@alexeytur

data:
#vacancy #–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #java #jvm #relocation #office #fulltime #Tallinn

Twilio‚Äôs Messaging teams are growing rapidly and now looking for Senior and Staff Software Engineer (I post only one JD link and if needed we'd move you on another level when interviewing)

Our office is based in #Tallinn, Veerenni 
üåè We provide relocation assistance.

Twilio is a cloud communications platform as a service company with HQ in San Francisco. Twilio allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls, send and receive text messages, and perform other communication functions using its web service APIs.

Who are we looking for?
üìç You are a Java enthusiast and professional. There is at least one framework in which you can be called an expert. If you are a professional in other languages and are interested in working on JVM stack, do not hesitate to sign up!
üìç You understand scalability challenges and the performance of server-side code. You can design and develop horizontally-scalable, resilient and performing-under-load systems. 
üìç You are proficient in cloud technologies and are hands-on in at least one cloud platform: GCP, AWS, or Azure. You are able to both design and develop cloud-based systems and operate them in an automated fashion.
üìç Databases. You have experience with multiple storage technologies and can reason about how to choose the suitable storage technology for a given purpose.
üìç You are passionate about quality and can engineer it at all stages of software development.
üìç You have strong communication skills and desire to make an impact and thrive in small, collaborative, energetic teams.

In this role you will work with a flurry of cloud technologies offered by AWS, as well as by our own platform. DynamoDB, Cassandra, SQL, ElasticSearch, Redis, Lambda, Load Balancers, Kinesis, SQS, Spark, Kafka - we use practically everything on the menu.

Why join us?
ü¶â As a software engineer in the Messaging BU you will design, develop, deploy and operate software solutions at scale, and to help Twilio deliver real-time, low latency capabilities for next-generation communications.
üöÄ You will primarily collaborate with other teams based in Tallinn and San Francisco and, of course, rest of the Twilio engineering globally. 
üéÅ All the perks that go with a world-changing tech company
üí∞ Salary 3,400-5000 eur net + stocks
üåè Help with relocation

Ask me questions here @Life1over

We can‚Äôt wait to see what you build.

#moscow #senior #midle #python
Conundrum provides an Industrial AI software platform to industrial factories helping them to eliminate waste, downtime, increase yield of manufacturing and decrease environmental impact of factories. Conundrum core technology is a time series processor which allows efficient processing and analysis of signals from industrial sensors and other sources. It helps to better monitor and perform optimization of industrial processes.

What you will do
‚óè  Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software (web services, data processing pipelines, etc.) in Python
‚óè  Participation in the development process improvement by doing internal development tasks that make our teams more efficient
‚óè  Drive adoption of best practices in code health, testing, and maintainability
Job Requirements
‚óè  Excellent Python programming skills (3+ years of experience)
‚óè  Practical skills with data science libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn. 
‚óè  Practical skills with web frameworks like FastAPI, Tornado, Flask, etc.
‚óè  Solid experience of work with relational and noSQL databases (PostgreSQL, Clickhouse, Redis)
‚óè  Understanding of computer science algorithms and data structures
‚óè  Understanding of software development life cycle and methodologies
‚óè  Development skills on a Unix or Linux platform (including networks)
‚óè  Development skills on a microservices development
‚óè  English ‚Äì upper-intermediate/advanced.
Nice to have
‚óè  Understanding of machine learning principles
‚óè  Experience with stream processing (Kafka)
‚óè  Experience in data engineering, building analytics applications
‚óè  Experience in application performance optimization  
‚óè  Experience with one or more general purpose programming languages including but not limited to: Java, C/C++
‚óè  Solid experience with cloud computing (Azure, AWS, Google Cloud or similar)
What we offer
‚óè  Competitive salary 230 000 - 300 000 ‚ÇΩ net
‚óè  Work with a globally leading machine learning team
‚óè  Balanced schedule home-office/company office
‚óè  Attractive equity package as an early employee
‚óè  Location ‚Äì 10 minutes walk from Sportivnaya Underground Station.

Project: a startup in the art industry.
REQUIREMENTS:
    Recent experience working with React, Redux, Node.js, Git, and NPM, GraphQL (Apollo).
    Prior experience with native Mobile Application Development for iPhone and Android using (Objective-C / Swift, or Java / Kotlin).
    Expert-level knowledge of JavaScript (ES6 / Typescript).
    Experience with object-oriented software development concepts, design patterns, data structures.
    Experience with visualisation libraries (highcharts, d3, etc.).
    Experience with Web Services (REST and SOAP), JSON and XML, MySQL, SQLite and mobile database expertise.
    Familiar with performance tools and optimization techniques.
    Familiar with at least one unit testing framework, such as Jest + end-to-end testing framework, such as Detox / Cypress.
    Experience using, integrating, and optimizing front end build and verification tools (esLint / tsLint / Prettier / Webpack / SASS).
    Experience with cloud solutions based on AWS Stack (Amplify, Appsync, Lambda)
    Work within an Agile software delivery environment.
BONUS IF YOU HAVE:
    Portfolio or a github account of cool projects.
    Experience of working with Continuous Integration (CI) and Unit Testing.
    Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
    Experience creating SDKs.

Senior Golang Backend 

üé©Adjust
https://www.adjust.com/

üí∞3500$ - 5000$ net
üåéRemote (Russia)

Adjust is a global app marketing analytics platform committed to ensuring the highest privacy and performance standards. Adjust's solutions include measurement, fraud prevention, cybersecurity, and automation tools. The company's mission is to make mobile marketing simpler, smarter and more secure for the more than 50,000 apps working with Adjust.

üî∏Ô∏èYour roleüî∏Ô∏è:
As a Go Backend Developer, you will directly contribute to high load Go services, which handle billions of incoming and outgoing HTTP requests that have strict data integrity requirements. Our backend is the core of Adjust‚Äôs attribution solution, it matches installs and in-app-events to ad campaigns, exports real-time data to clients, and offers clients protection against advertising fraud. As our client base grows, we‚Äôll need more help building these core features.
(Remote or Office, USD)

üìçYour responsibilitiesüìç:

‚Äî Be part of the process from the code‚Äôs inception to its release and beyond
‚Äî Keep the code clean, fast, and efficient to handle up to 700k requests per second
‚Äî Investigate issues and track down their source in the codebase
‚Äî Review the code of your peers to ensure high-quality code
‚Äî Instrument code with metrics and logs to watch and monitor behavior
‚Äî Integrate with third parties such as Facebook and Google

üìçWhat you bringüìç:

‚Äî Experience in backend development (3+ years would be ideal)
‚Äî Basic knowledge of Go (professional experience or personal projects)
‚Äî A basic understanding of Adjust's business and the product is a plus
‚Äî Experience with Redis, PostgreSQL, Kafka, Aerospike, and git is a plus
‚Äî Excellent communication skills and the ability to break down complex issues in a simple and understandable way
‚Äî Great team player who loves to share knowledge and support colleagues within the team and the company

üìåWhat‚Äôs in it for youüìå:

‚Äî Opportunity to make an impact on the ad-tech industry working for a forward-thinking leader in the space
‚Äî Collaborative environment with a focus on continuous learning
‚Äî Education budget for ongoing professional development & continuous learning
‚Äî Free language classes
‚Äî Additional private health insurance
‚Äî Flexible, family-friendly work schedule and vacation policy
‚Äî Subsidized fitness membership
‚Äî WFH program with remote online events (workouts, coffee chats, team events, games, etc.)
‚Äî We have an office in St. Petersburg with the best and most comfortable conditions :)

data:
FullStack developer (Ruby on Rails / React)
Remote.
Competitive Salary in US dollars (depending on your skills).
Further relocation to Canada is available and additionally negotiated.

Who we are
The international company, working at the forefront of eReader development, making interactive digital textbooks and eBooks available to schools and to consumers who enjoy immersive reading on web and mobile devices.

Our technologies
Our application is a standard Ruby on Rails app deployed through Docker. We currently use SQL databases (mySQL migrating to Postgres) and will be integrating Redis for performance enhancements.
Our web assets are built with a mix of React, Backbone, SASS, TS, CSS, EJS Templates, JS, and HTML.

Your responsibilities:
Deliver maintainable, well-tested and structured code and documentation.
Be able to work independently and resolve technical tasks with minimal guidance. This includes not only code but research and decision-making regarding best practices.
Communicate effectively with co-workers to ensure team efficiency and provide mentoring as needed to more junior developers.
Review pull-requests as requested and, more broadly, maintain a critical eye on system performance and security.
Be able to compose and present comprehensive proposals during design tasks that outline options and assessments.

More info
Aplply to olga@new.hr

üìß–ü–∏—à–∏—Ç–µ –≤ –õ–° @talina_zazmic üìù‚ö†Ô∏è
#—É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ #remote #fulltime #node.js #job #–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è

Required skills
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of full-time work experience as a backend software engineer
Familiar with the ES6 (ECMAScript 6) standard of Javascript, have development experience using ES6
‚Ä¢ standard
‚Ä¢ Comfortable working with databases including schema design, and query optimizations. Plus: Experience
‚Ä¢ working with MongoDB.
‚Ä¢ Have a passion for efficient and well written code
‚Ä¢ Complex software systems development with production quality deployment, monitoring and reliability
‚Ä¢ Ability to decompose complex business problems and collaborate in solving them
‚Ä¢ Comfort with ambiguity and rapidly changing requirements
‚Ä¢ Growth mindset. Collaboration with a healthy balance of humility and confidence
‚Ä¢ Plus: Familiar with Microservices, Google Cloud Platform is preferred

We Propose
‚Ä¢ Be yourself, feel valued, supported, learn and grow to build your future self
‚Ä¢ Create and operate in a lean software development lifecycle; code, test, release, improve
‚Ä¢ Rare opportunity to be a part of core engineering team members to lay the engineering foundation

Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Setting up the infrastructure to "route" requests from RoR to Node.js servers. APIGee or other appropriate api gateway should be used.
‚Ä¢ Work is the research project team to make sure best practices are being followed.
‚Ä¢ Work with Architect to build out / maintain the self describing API. (GraphQL)
‚Ä¢ Develop a scripting server for scripting injection into the Ruby engine. This needs to be platform secure.
‚Ä¢ Start creating the microservices architecture
‚Ä¢ Pull out the some services processing from the RoR stack. 
‚Ä¢ Build the dynamic query endpoint in Node
‚Ä¢ investigate a way to convert Ruby code to Node macro-services -vs- RoR Monolith.

Project description
Boostr is a venture backed enterprise software company building solutions for the media & advertising industry. Frustrated by generic, horizontal CRM products, the founders decided to build the platform they wish they had as operators at Yahoo. We started with a CRM platform that‚Äôs disrupting how media sales teams are managed resulting in time savings, increased forecast accuracy and revenue growth. Then we introduced an Order Management (OMS) product disrupting the market with the first omni-channel solution. Now we‚Äôre the only platform with a single CRM+OMS to manage the entire workflow. The best part, we‚Äôre just getting started and have an exciting roadmap of new products and features that will change the advertising world.
https://boostr.com/

Key Stats:
We‚Äôre inventing what the future looks like enabling our customers to realize their GTM strategies
5 years young
60+ employees - 30 on technical team
$13m + in funding, inclusive of a $7M Series A in July 2020, from Vocap Investment Partners, Bertelsmann Digital Media, Lightspeed, WGI, C2Ventures, Math Capital and the ‚Äúwho‚Äôs who‚Äù of media insiders
We work with industry leaders - Buzzfeed, Outfront, Electronic Arts, Vevo, Complex, Match Media, Axios
Growing over 100% YoY

Country: Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur (–°–µ–π—á–∞—Å —Å—Ä–∞–∑—É —É–¥–∞–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç, —Ä–µ–ª–æ–∫–∞—Ü–∏—è –∫–∞–∫ —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä–æ—é—Ç –≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã)

Salary:  2500-3500 $ net
–ö–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è: Clever Recruiting Company 

International Fin Tech company is looking for a Data Scientist to join our team in Malaysia, Kuala Lumpur.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Identify and integrate new datasets that can be leveraged through product capabilities and work closely with the BI/engineering team to strategize and execute the development of data products. 
‚Ä¢ Analyze data for trends and patterns, and interpret data with a clear objective in mind. 
‚Ä¢ Implement new statistical or other mathematical methodologies as needed for specific  models or analysis. 
‚Ä¢ Optimize joint development efforts through appropriate database use and project designs.

Requirements: 
‚Ä¢PhD or Masters in Mathematics, Applied Statistics, Actuarial Science, or any other related computational/quantitative discipline. 
‚Ä¢ Knowledge&experience on causality&predictive modeling techniques-l inearandnon-linear regression modeling, model validation signals analysis, time-series analyses etc. 
‚Ä¢Strong knowledge of Python and comfort with R, Matlab, Tableau, and/or any other relevant statistical modeling, visualization, large dataset handling languages:
- Experience with common data science toolkits such as Python, R, Weka, etc. 
- Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig. 

We offer:
‚ÅÉ Relocation package 
‚ÅÉ Free meal for breakfast, lunch and dinner and supper everyday (different cuisine everyday)
‚ÅÉ Free Gym 
‚ÅÉ Insurance coverage both inpatient and outpatient (Dental and Optical Allowances)
‚ÅÉ Fixed transport allowances 
‚ÅÉ International team

One of the most exciting start up projects in the retail and restaurant business in Russia for 2020 has launched the search for its leader to start its operations in Russia, which will soon boast several hundred stores and E-commerce across the country.

For this challenging task we are recruiting an executive who is not afraid to get their hands dirty when opening the first locations or serving the first customers, at the same time ensuring that the business in Russia is put on a solid foundation with all required proccesses.

The main responsibility will be to supervises the start up of the company, including: directly C-Level Executives (COO, CMO, CDO, CFO, other key positions, etc), indirectly all departments (including Human Resources, Legal, Supply Chain, IT/Tech, all corporate staff), and all restaurant-level staff.

Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢        Actively participate during all phases of the development lifecycle: From design through implementation, and as expert in continuous integration, deployment and agile product development and release management.
‚Ä¢        Act as lead developer for web platform: including front-end applications and a REST-based service gateway.
‚Ä¢        Act as mentor, coach and guide for junior software developers.
‚Ä¢        Support innovative product development and improvement activities, including researching alternative approaches, related topics and evaluating new technologies.
‚Ä¢        Actively assisting in product design and architectural processes.
 
 
Requirements:
‚Ä¢        University, technical college or equivalent qualification in Computer Science, Software Engineering or a closely related subject
‚Ä¢        Extensive hands-on software development experience at expert level.
‚Ä¢        Proven working experience in Java development, for production networked server environments, using Spring, Web applications and REST services.
‚Ä¢        Security background - experience with cryptographic technologies
‚Ä¢        Experience in software requirements definition, problem analysis and solutions design using common design patterns (software and architectural).
‚Ä¢        Strong skills in the implementation aspects of Software, Network and System Security.
‚Ä¢        Optional: Other languages e.g. Python, C/C++, Go, Rust, ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¢        Optional: UNIX/Linux related systems knowledge, including Systems Programming.
‚Ä¢         Optional: Experience with test-driven development, CI/CD and component packaging.
‚Ä¢         Close collaboration with, and guidance of, Quality Assurance personnel will be needed

‚óè 3+ years of full-time work experience as a backend software engineer
‚óè Familiar with the ES6 (ECMAScript 6) standard of Javascript, have development experience using ES6 standard
‚óè Comfortable working with databases including schema design, and query optimizations.  Plus : Experience working with MongoDB.
‚óè Have a passion for efficient and well written code
‚óè Complex software systems development with production quality deployment, monitoring and reliability
‚óè Ability to decompose complex business problems and collaborate in solving them

–ë—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø–ª—é—Å–æ–º
We look for a team leader who can relate positively to and engage with a wide range of people.

He or she should have strong self-motivation skills, being a reliable and flexible team-player who is ready to work in an Agile environment. We seek the professional with high attention to details, a sense of ownership, and responsibility. We‚Äôre looking for the champion who loves coding, learns all the time, and can‚Äôt wait to let us know about the latest cool tool he has tried.

‚óè We let our specialists be themselves, feel valued, supported, learn and grow to build your future self.
‚óè Create and operate in a lean software development lifecycle; code, test, release, improve.

‚ùóWe are looking for talented and motivated Senior QA Engineer to join our team who can hit the ground running and take our product to the next level. As a QA Engineer, you will drive quality aspects in your distributed Scrum team and build together modern applications today to influence tomorrow‚Äôs Field Service.
üîπThe Role & Responsibilities
Review business requirements and functional specifications to understand the functional and technical requirements
‚Ä¢ Analyze feature requirements and define appropriate testing measures ‚Äì functional tests, regression tests, stress and/or performance tests, etc
‚Ä¢ Analyze and identify suitable opportunities for test automation
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain automated tests using appropriate tools, frameworks and programming languages
‚Ä¢ Leverage best practices and available automation frameworks to reduce automation maintenance
‚Ä¢ Support quality relevant activities throughout the software development life cycle
üîπKey requirements
‚Ä¢ Higher technical education
‚Ä¢ Strong technical skills and experience in creating both functional and non-functional tests, automation and manual testing, ideally in a continuous delivery environment
Good know-how in one or more frameworks like Selenium, REST Assured, Gatling, Cypress, etc
‚Ä¢ Know-how of at least one coding language like Java, JavaScript, Python, etc
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English
üîπNice to have
‚Ä¢ Understanding of Docker, Kubernetes, Selenium Grid is an advantage
‚Ä¢ Experience working in a distributed team
üîπJoin us because of:
‚Ä¢ Attractive salary and bonuses on delivery by major milestones
‚Ä¢ Friendly international environment with agile open-minded culture
‚Ä¢ Professional and carrier growth
‚Ä¢ Annual salary raise
‚Ä¢ 100% paid out sick leaves
‚Ä¢ 28 calendar days of holiday leave
‚Ä¢ Business trips to European countries (at will)
You will be joining a distributed international team working on an application(s) being part of a complex Field Service Management solution.

data:
#vacancy #–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è #java #jvm #relocation #office #fulltime #Tallinn

Twilio‚Äôs Messaging teams are growing rapidly and now looking for Senior and Staff Software Engineer.

Our office is based in #Tallinn, Veerenni 
üåè We provide relocation assistance.

Twilio is a cloud communications platform as a service company with HQ in San Francisco. Twilio allows software developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls, send and receive text messages, and perform other communication functions using its web service APIs.

Who are we looking for?
üìç You are a Java enthusiast and professional. There is at least one framework in which you can be called an expert. If you are a professional in other languages and are interested in working on JVM stack, do not hesitate to sign up!
üìç You understand scalability challenges and the performance of server-side code. You can design and develop horizontally-scalable, resilient and performing-under-load systems. 
üìç You are proficient in cloud technologies and are hands-on in at least one cloud platform: GCP, AWS, or Azure. You are able to both design and develop cloud-based systems and operate them in an automated fashion.
üìç Databases. You have experience with multiple storage technologies and can reason about how to choose the suitable storage technology for a given purpose.
üìç You are passionate about quality and can engineer it at all stages of software development.
üìç You have strong communication skills and desire to make an impact and thrive in small, collaborative, energetic teams.

In this role you will work with a flurry of cloud technologies offered by AWS, as well as by our own platform. DynamoDB, Cassandra, SQL, ElasticSearch, Redis, Lambda, Load Balancers, Kinesis, SQS, Spark, Kafka - we use practically everything on the menu.

Why join us?
ü¶â As a software engineer in the Messaging BU you will design, develop, deploy and operate software solutions at scale, and to help Twilio deliver real-time, low latency capabilities for next-generation communications.
üöÄ You will primarily collaborate with other Platform teams based in Tallinn and San Francisco and, of course, rest of the Twilio engineering globally. 
üéÅ All the perks that go with a world-changing tech company
üí∞ Salary 3,400-5000 eur net + RSU
üåè Help with relocation

Welcome to chat! @Life1over

We can‚Äôt wait to see what you build.

‚ö°Ô∏è–ó–∞–Ω—è—Ç–æ—Å—Ç—å: full-time
‚ö°Ô∏è–°—Å—ã–ª–∫–∞ –Ω–∞ –≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—é: https://jobs.opera.com/p/bd4383913e57-software-developer 

Senior Android developer

üá∏üá™ Description:
Would you like to join a major internet company located just next door?

How would it be to really make an impact on the way people access the web? At Opera, the innovations you create are quickly implemented and delivered to our users. We have small independent teams who work fast to improve the internet experience of our 360 million users worldwide. We compete with the giants in Silicon Valley.

üá∏üá™ We are looking for software developers who have the curiosity and drive to join our Android teams. You will be working with Java and Android, but we believe that a good developer can learn and master any new field. We have humble and really skilled team members that are eager to share their knowledge and help you in any situation.

üá∏üá™ We believe in skill, not certification. While a good understanding of computer science and the realities of practical software development are a must, titles and diplomas play no role at Opera.

üá∏üá™ Our organization is flat and we work in tight-knit and iterative processes between product managers, designers, developers and quality assurance engineers. We do code reviews as well as privacy and security reviews to bring the quality of our products to the next level. As a consumer-oriented company, the input from our end users is highly valued. We monitor their feedback closely and improve the product to fit their needs.

üá∏üá™ This kind of agile workflow requires people with an autonomous working style, who take their own initiatives to improve systems and processes. A high quality product also requires people with a good sense of usability and attention to detail. However, we don‚Äôt expect a single team member to possess all of these skills. Instead, we‚Äôre looking for dedicated co-workers who are eager to contribute and grow both technically and personally.

üá∏üá™Moreover, work-life balance is important to us, and we know that people are creative at different times of the day. You can choose to start early or work late, as long as you are available to your colleagues during core hours, from 10 am - 3 pm. This means being available online while working remotely, and being at the office once we return.

–ö–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç –¥–ª—è —Å–≤—è–∑–∏: @seleznevaksu

–ù–∞—à –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç –∑–∞–ø—É—â–µ–Ω –≤ 2017 –≥–æ–¥—É. –ú—ã —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞–ª–∏ –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—É, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–∞—è –ø–æ–º–æ–≥–∞–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø–∞–Ω–∏—è–º –Ω–∞–Ω—è—Ç—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ñ–µ—Å—Å–∏–æ–Ω–∞–ª–æ–≤ –≤ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ñ–µ—Ä–µ, –∞ —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç—ã –≤ —Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤–µ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ —Å–µ–±–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ö–æ–¥—è—â—É—é —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç—É.

Back-end –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–µ–Ω —Å –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º Python 2.7, Django 1.9.6 —Å Django Rest Framework 3.4.6, PostgreSQL 9.5, Swagger. –†–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∞ Nginx + Gunicorn. –ò —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—â–µ–Ω–Ω–æ –Ω–∞ AWS EC2 (t2.large).

–í–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏ —Å—Ç–∞—Ä—ã–µ, –∑–Ω–∞–µ–º, –Ω–æ –Ω–∞ –Ω–∏—Ö –¥–∞–ª—å—à–µ –Ω–µ –ø–ª–∞–Ω–∏—Ä—É–µ–º —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å. –í –ø–µ—Ä–≤—É—é –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥—å –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω–∞–∫–∞—Ç–∏—Ç—å –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –¥–æ —Ç–æ–π –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏ —Å –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π —Ç—ã —Å–µ–π—á–∞—Å —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–µ—à—å, –ø–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–µ—Ç—å –≥–¥–µ —á—Ç–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ—Å—Ç–∞–ª–æ —Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞—Ç—å, –º–æ–¥–∏—Ñ–∏—Ü–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ–¥ –Ω–æ–≤—É—é –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏—é. –í—Å–µ –Ω–æ–≤—ã–µ —Ñ–∏—á–∏ –∏ –æ–±–Ω–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è –±—É–¥–µ–º –≤—ã–∫–∞—Ç—ã–≤–∞—Ç—å —É–∂–µ –Ω–∞ –Ω–æ–≤–æ–π –≤–µ—Ä—Å–∏–∏. –í –æ–±—â–µ–º –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤–∞—è —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞, –Ω–∏–∫–∞–∫–æ–≥–æ –∞—É—Ç—Å–æ—Ä—Å–∞.

–ú—ã —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–ª–∏ GoNative –¥–ª—è –ø—Ä–µ–æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –Ω–∞—à–µ–≥–æ –≤–µ–±-–ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏—è –≤ –≥–∏–±—Ä–∏–¥–Ω–æ–µ –ø—Ä–∏–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–ª—è iOS.
